transcript: She's graduated from high school and she's playing the play for colleges and stuff. She's so great. She has so much life and energy and stuff.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: She just graduated from high school and----she's planning to apply for colleges----and stuff.She's so great.  She has so much life and energy and stuff.
